name: Tank Arena Shooter (Split-Screen Version)
description:
This is a 2 player split-screen arena shooter. Each player has a tank equipped with the main cannon and one defensive weapon (mines in this version). There is one central ammo station to refill ammo over time and there are 2 - 3 barrel changing stations where the player tank gets a new barrel aka a new weapon. 

This is just a test version or prototype to test the basic gameplay. I am starting to make a multiplayer version of this game where 4 players (maybe up to eight) can fight each other in different game modes, like Deathmatch, Team-Deathmatch, Capture the flag etc. 

Update #1 

I decided that it is better to make a single player version first. That means different enemies, more maps and various game modes.
Some ideas for the game modes are Survive as long as possible, defend random areas, clear the map etc. I plan on making different kinds of maps that match the game modes. I think it is easier for a game like that to be fun in a singleplayer environment rather than in a multiplayer environment. I still plan on making a multiplayer version after that. As soon as I have a playable single player version I am going to upload it to itch io. 

Link to the devlog for the single player version.

In this version, two players can fight each other on split-screen and test things out but that's it. There are no Gamemodes, stats or win/ lose conditions. Currently the game has no sound. It is just a sandbox.

First player can play with Keyboard/ Mouse or Controller and second player has to use a controller. 

If you experience performance issues, disable Tank Trail System in the options menu. Currently, that system is very expensive.
